sentences.en: Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.
sentences.cn: 柔和的人有福阿!因为他们必承受得地土.

sentences.en: He just pretends to be meek so he can have his own way.
sentences.cn: 他假装温顺,然后可以为所欲为.

sentences.en: He was always so meek and mild .
He was more weary, meek and brow - beaten.
sentences.cn: 他显得更疲惫 、 更缺乏胆量和愁眉苦脸.

sentences.en: Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢的至福是 “ 保佑温顺的人,他们将继承土地 ”.

sentences.en: I'll be meek under their coldness and repentant of my evil ways.
sentences.cn: 我愿意乖乖地忍受她们的奚落,忏悔我过去的恶行.

sentences.en: In the middle age ,'Daft'were meant meek.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪, ‘ 达夫特’是可蔼,富有同情心的意思.

sentences.en: Let us be silent, content in our little corner, meek and gentle like them.
sentences.cn: 让我们保持着沉默, 满足于自己小小的天地, 象他们一样平易温顺吧.

sentences.en: Minetta's voice had a meek irony.
sentences.cn: 米尼塔的口气里略带几分讥刺.

sentences.en: On the surface she seemed meek, rather insipid.
sentences.cn: 表面上她似乎温顺驯服，相当乏味无趣。

sentences.en: She looked meek but had the heart of a lion.
sentences.cn: 她表面温顺,但具有一颗狮子的心.

sentences.en: She maintained a kind of meek-ness.
sentences.cn: 她保持着一种温顺的态度。

sentences.en: She won't object — she's so meek and mild.
sentences.cn: 她不会反对的——她是那么顺服温和.

sentences.en: The little girl is as meek as a lamb.
sentences.cn: 那个小姑娘像羔羊一般温顺.

sentences.en: The meek shall inherit the earth.
They called her Miss Mouse because she was so meek and mild .
sentences.cn: 他们称她为“鼠小姐”，因为她总是那么懦弱谦和。

words.tran_cn: 温顺地；逆来顺受地；忠厚地

trans.tran_en: very quiet and gentle and unwilling to argue with people
